data.oai_dc:dc: CTmax = critical thermal maximum in degrees Celsius, ColonyID = identity of the colony from which the individual worker ants were tested, habitat.designation = whether the habitat is "urban" or "rural", longitude = the decimal degrees longitude of the collection site of the colony, latitude = the decimal degrees latitude of the collection site of the colony, treatment = the temperature treatment under which the colonies were reared in the laboratory, including 21, 23, 25, 27, or 29 degrees Celsius, city = the urbanization cline from which the colonies were obtained, including "Knx" (Knoxville, TN), "Cin" (Cincinnati, OH), "Cle" (Cleveland, OH)
